en.title: Cat Flu Symptoms and Treatment: Causes of Sneezing, Runny Nose, and Eye Discharge
en.content:
Cat flu is a general term for upper respiratory infections in cats, caused by viruses and bacteria. Kittens and cats with weakened immune systems are especially susceptible.

Common Symptoms

Symptoms include sneezing, runny nose, nasal congestion, eye discharge, watery eyes, fever, loss of appetite, and lethargy. In severe cases, it can progress to stomatitis or pneumonia.

Viruses That Cause Cat Flu

The primary culprits are Feline Herpesvirus (FHV-1) and Feline Calicivirus (FCV). Secondary infections from Chlamydia felis or other bacteria may also occur.

Treatment and Home Care

Seek veterinary care for a proper diagnosis and treatment tailored to the symptoms. Antibiotics (to prevent secondary infection), eye drops, and nasal care may be prescribed. At home, keep the environment warm and humid. If nasal congestion prevents eating, warming wet food to enhance its smell can help encourage your cat to eat.

Prevention

Regular combination vaccinations are the most effective preventive measure. While vaccines cannot completely prevent infection, they can significantly reduce the severity of symptoms.

zh.title: 猫感冒的症状与对策：打喷嚏、流鼻涕、眼屎的原因
zh.content:
猫感冒是猫上呼吸道感染的统称，由病毒和细菌引起。幼猫和免疫力低下的猫咪尤其容易感染。

主要症状

症状包括打喷嚏、流鼻涕、鼻塞、眼屎、流泪、发烧、食欲下降、精神萎靡等。严重时可能发展为口腔炎或肺炎。

致病病毒

主要病原体为猫疱疹病毒（FHV-1）和猫杯状病毒（FCV）。还可能合并猫衣原体或其他细菌的继发感染。

治疗与家庭护理

请带猫咪就医，根据症状进行针对性治疗。兽医可能会开具抗生素（预防继发感染）、眼药水和鼻腔护理用品。在家中应保持温暖湿润的环境。如果猫咪因鼻塞而无法进食，可以将湿粮加热以增强气味，帮助猫咪进食。

预防措施

定期接种多联疫苗是最有效的预防方法。虽然疫苗无法完全阻止感染，但可以显著减轻症状的严重程度。
